attributes.review: Hello! I downloaded this app for information on the official Cheeto merch line only to find that this app and its creators praise acts of violence towards black people, encourages hate crimes against the lgbtqia+ community, is openly xenophobic and sexist, is ran by a rapist and condones sexual assault and harassment, and has underlying pedophilic content.
